# Class fields XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_autoSliding=Auto-Sliding XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_interval=Interval XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_carouselWidth=Width XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_carouselHeight=Height XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_backgroundColor=Background Color xcarousel.slide_title=Caption title xcarousel.slide_titleSize=Title size xcarousel.slide_titleColor=Title color xcarousel.slide_text=Caption text xcarousel.slide_textSize=Text size xcarousel.slide_textColor=Text Color xcarousel.slide_link=Caption title link
